participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and dedicated, Jake is someone who values loyalty and responsibility. He has a nurturing side, especially towards his pets.
participant_1.background: i am a construction worker. i've 5 cats. my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and resilient, Sarah approaches life with a laid-back attitude but carries a depth of experience that informs her perspective.
participant_2.background: i did not graduate high school. i live in canada. my grandfather served in world war a. my favourite food is shawarma.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
